body.name: Vetroo Sakura Pink Frame 120mm ARGB LED Case Cooling Fan Computer PC Cooler High Airflow High-Performance Controller Free with 5V 3pin Motherboard Sync (1 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: ARGB Lighting: The RGB lighting can be synchronized with the 5V addressable motherboard and can be easily installed by connecting the standard 5V 3PIN RGB header to the Motherboard ARGB header, It allows you to choose your preferred rgb lighting anytime.
Controller Free: The ARGB lights are powered by the motherboard and the fan speed is powered by the power supply. Separate powered solution provides a safe and reliable power output.
Sweet Pink Frame: High quality white fan blades and pink frame make the overall look romantic. It perfectly matches with the white / pink computer case.
Optimal Cooling Solution: The fan come with nine fan blades for better airflow. It balances the best cooling performance with the lowest noise.
Super Quiet: Equipped with rubber pads and hydraulic bearing, which greatly reduce operating noise and improves efficiency.
body.description: Vetroo fan is tuned for high-airflow and large volume air-flow to keep your computer cooler! Our fan is combined with the technology that will reduce the noise and efficient. Vetroo fan is ideal for mounting in your PC case as exhaust fans for your PC’s motherboard and CPU, graphics accelerators, and other components that fill the case with heat Specifications: Dimension: 120*25*120 mm Fan Speed: 1500rpm (+/-10%) RPM Airflow: 35.2 CFM(Max) Operating Voltage: 12V Power Input: 1.92W Weight: 150g / 0.29 oz Rated Power: 4.2W Rated Voltage: DC 12V Rated Current: 0.35A Sound Level; 20-32 dBA Connector: 3/4pin connector Bearing Type: Hydraulic Bearing Lifetime: 20000Hrs Package Included: 1* pink case fan 4* screws

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value, quiet and colorful
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These are a great value, I got three fans and a hub controller for less than other packs that come without a controller.ARGB: My Mobo does not have an ARGB header so I'm able to have argb with the controller, there are many solid colors and combinations. the white on full brightness looks a little more yellow than when on lower brightness but it's not a big deal to me.NOISE: Not bad at all, no rattling and very quiet. I only noticed the air through the fans when on much higher RPMs but i don't mind that sound at all.FAN SPEEDS: I noticed that the product picture of controller showing to plug one fan on port 7 for PWM control is incorrect as I plugged mine on the white slot which is port 12 and the others on 11, 10 and so forth. I plugged the PWM cable to my Mobo 4pin sys fan 1 header and I can control speeds by temp.Overall, very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Why pay 29.99 a fan when you can 8.99 for one that does the same thing? Lol! 😂 great fans and great value! You're kickin ass Vetroo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were easy to install, and they look great, love the RBG feature, and they match my daughters gaming set up! These fans are also very quiet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need a seperate/replacement controller since no PWM function. Nice fans though
reviews.reviewText: I like the fans. They look nice and are relatively quiet, the noise level would be better if PWM worked but the included controller, while being able to fit on a 4 pin PWM connector on the motherboard, cannot be controlled by the motherboards BIOS. In fact, the fans while spinning do not show in the bios at all. The controller on the Vetroo case I was using previously could be used with PWM. Needless to say, this aspect of the fans is disappointing, since I now have to purchase a controller, adding more cost to my build. Maybe for the price point, adding an extra wire is too much to ask

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They have a slight noise to them but its hardly noticeable. I love all the options they give. I am however a little disappointed with the options the remote gives. Its a little limiting. Besides that its great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and cheap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice RGB Case Fans with Good Air Flow
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased the Montech Sky One Lite case which had two intake fans and one exhaust in the rear. I initially ordered one Vetroo RGB fan to add on the top for exhaust. Afterwards, I decided to convert all the case fans to RGB and ordered four more Vetroo fans. I replaced all the Montech fans with Vetroo fans and I'm happy with the result. My current build includes 3 intake in the front and two exhaust fans.The air flow from the fans is good and the RGB is sufficient for my purposes. I certainly didn't want to go down the RGB rabbit hole with software that could cause conflicts, so I just used the remote to cycle through the variety of effects, finally settling on orange to match the case LEDs. The orange looks a little pinkish in the video but not when viewed live. The fans can display a variety of colors.My new build is an i7 13700k with RX6750xt graphics card, all white DeepCool AK620 and a Gigabyte Z790 motherboard. I have included the Corsair 32 GB RGB ram kit to finalize the build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for the buck.
reviews.reviewText: These fans work as intended and have a great light display. I very rarely hear them and I have 10 of these on my pc tower. Go for it Vetroo in my book have been a superb brand that doesn't break the bank. I will continue to use their products and only switch if I ever find something in the same price range that perform this good.
Los compré para utilizar con mi AIO Vetroo, el controlador no tiene imán, lo que hace difícil su manejo de cables en general. Fuera de eso, el producto cumple

Bought these with a 5 dollar discount so 3 for 35 bucks fo a 3 set wich I thought was very decent so gave them a try. For the money spent I'm really happy with the checkboxs these checked and can live with the ones they didn't... These are not proprietary, meaning they have a 4 pin connector for fans and 5v 3 pin led connector, each fans led connectors also has a pig tall son you could in theory daisy Cain them all from one led connector or you can just use them via the hub with sata power. Even thought connected to the fan header I can not control or see them in bios and they are a little loud. They do move alot of airEdit 04/11/2022: I have also used the white ones and quality is consistent. I did want to add that I almost didn't purchase them because of the grey shock absorbers on the corners that they are advertised with, I wasn't digging the grey for my color scheme, but these came with white and I like that. But they should consider properly displaying the product as I almost passed them by because of it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality construction and moves a lot of air
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 2 x 3-Pack Vetroo 120mm PWM RGB fans (6 in total). Installed all six in the case, then wired to the included single fan hub which was double sided taped to the back of the Cooler Master TD500 case. Fitment was not an issue with the rear cover door. Connected the single PWM 4-pin fan connector to the Gigabyte B450 AORUS M motherboard, then the SATA to the EVGA power supply connector for power. Gigabyte's AORUS has built-in RGB control from within the BIOS so no software was required to select different RGB themes. Tested the supplied Vetroo remote and it also can control the RGB lighting as well. Comparing these to my experience with Corsair SP120 fans, I was surprised that they performed nearly as well, but at less than half the price. Note: to have full PWM control, then use a fan splitter instead of the hub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my son. Great fans and lots of colours to play around with making his pc look good.Controller helps so you don't need various plugs on motherboard

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Fans but horrible included hub
reviews.reviewText: The fans in pink look amazing, really great quality. I love how solid they feel and the added rubber details on the corners for noise vibration. I'm using them with an MSI motherboard and no issues with the light effects through Dragon Centre. The only issue is with the included fan hub. Works fine for argb but nothing for pwm.Found out after the fact trying to use PWM using the hub is useless as the pwm part doesn't get enough current so it isn't detected. PWM directly from fan to mobo works as it should but I now have to buy fan splitters because I don't have enough system fan headers. The included controller doesn't provide enough control for fan speed. Without PWM the default has them going full tilt. Loud like an aircraft carrier. Vetroo needs to improve their fan hubs so buyers can get full functionality without spending more money.
